SkyHost: Big HDD VPS and Cheap Shared Hosting in Germany!

cheap shared hosting, cheap vps, cheapest vps, cpanel, germany, shared hosting, skyhost, skyhost.pk July 11, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome, SkyHost!  They’re a Pakistani hosting company that is bringing us some cheap VPS and cheap shared hosting offers in Germany.

  • Get a 1GB VM with 50GB of HDD space for $5/mo!
  • Or cPanel hosting starting at $3/mo!

Always interesting to see how hosts try to stand out.  Sky Host‘s pricing isn’t exceptional but 50GB of HDD to start is on the high side, so if you have large-ish storage needs, these guys may be a fit for you.

They are registered in Pakistan (5942212). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (Privacy Policy). They accept Bitcoin, UBL Bank Transfer, Jazzcash, Easypaisa.

Here’s a little about Sky in their own words:

“We are a Pakistani web hosting company. We, at the SKY HOST not only Endeavour to provide you with the best services of cheap web hosting in Pakistan but to help you in initiating and growing your business securely and at a high speed.

SKY HOST office is located in Lahore, Pakistan. The best international web hosting in Lahore standards are rendered by the SKY HOST to our clients. Our team is available 24 hours to support and resolve your issues via e-mail and live chat. We work with the best professionals in the country holding rich web hosting Company experience of years, who have a great command and firm grip over all the latest technologies of web hosting. A complete team is all ready to serve about web hosting in Islamabad and domain registration you just at a click.”

Have you been a Sky customer? Please share your experience in the comments below.
